rukus.text: 26|3|Sojad mexohi az [anduhi] in ki [musrikon] imon nameovarand, xudro halok kuni
26|4|Agar ʙixohem, az osmon nisonae ʙar onon nozil mekunem, ki dar ʙaroʙaras ʙo furutani sar furud ovarand
26|5|Va hec pandi tozae az sui [Allohi] Rahmon ʙaroi onon nameojad, magar in ki az on ruj gardonand
26|6|Ba rosti, onon [da'vati pajomʙaron va azoʙi qijomatro] duruƣ angostand, pas, ʙa zudi axʙori on ci masxara mekardand, ʙa eson xohad rasid
26|7|Ojo ʙa zamin namenigarand, ki ci ʙisjor az har guna [gijohi] sudmande dar on rujonidaem
26|8|Be tardid, dar in [ofarinis] nisonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo ʙar meod] ast, vale ʙestarason imon nameovarand
26|9|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
